metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35511 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A global buffer overflow was discovered in pngcheck function inpngcheck-2.4.0(5 patches applied) via a crafted png file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35511` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pngcheck - 3.0.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pngcheck package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-2').
